products.title: Velvet Zest Yellow Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Velvet zest yellow roman blind in yellow. Made to measure from 17.59 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, their smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. 
 
This soft roman blind in zest yellow, adds a twist of colour to your home. A medium lemon-yellow shade with green undertones, this velvet yellow roman blind creates a decadent look for a fraction of the price on the high street. 
 
At swift direct blinds, not only is this roman blind made by the experts at their yorkshire factory, but with over 50 years experience, their roman blinds are made to last. Their roman blinds come with five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, and customer-first service!
